Deprecated API

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.brightcove.player.media.ErrorListener
    com.brightcove.player.media.PlaylistListener
    com.brightcove.player.media.VideoListener
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.brightcove.player.media.Catalog
    com.brightcove.omniture.CustomPlayerDelegate
    com.brightcove.player.media.tasks.FindMediaTask
    com.brightcove.player.media.tasks.FindPlaylistTask
    com.brightcove.player.media.tasks.FindVideoTask
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcoveClosedCaptioningView.DEFAULT_HORIZONTAL_GRAVITY
    As of 4.8.0, this is no longer used.
    com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcoveClosedCaptioningView.DEFAULT_VERTICAL_GRAVITY
    As of 4.8.0, this is no longer used.
    com.brightcove.player.display.SeamlessVideoDisplayComponent.MAX_POSITION
    Use Event.MAX_POSITION instead.
    com.brightcove.player.display.SeamlessVideoDisplayComponent.MIN_POSITION
    Use Event.MIN_POSITION instead.
    com.brightcove.player.event.EventType.SET_CAPTIONS_STATE
    As of 4.7.1, no longer used.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.brightcove.player.management.BrightcovePluginManager.getCommitIdentifier()
    Please use BuildConfig.COMMIT_ID instead.
    com.brightcove.player.management.BrightcovePluginManager.getReleaseIdentifier()
    Please use BuildConfig.RELEASE_ID instead.
    com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcoveVideoView.getSurfaceView()
    Please use BrightcoveVideoView.getRenderView() instead.
    com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcoveClosedCaptioningView.initialize(EventEmitter)
    Please use the initiliaze(EventEmitter, BaseVideoView) method instead.
    com.brightcove.ima.GoogleIMAComponent.initializeAdsRequests()
    It's no longer necessary to call this method. The initialization of Ad Rules happens automatically now.
    com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcoveClosedCaptioningView.prepareLayout()
    As of 4.8.0, no longer does anything.
    com.brightcove.freewheel.controller.FreeWheelController.setAdManagerURL(String)
    com.brightcove.freewheel.cuepoint.AdCuePointComponent.skipCurrentAds()
    This method will be removed in a future release. Please update your code at the earliest to use AdCuePointComponent.skipCurrentAdBreak() method instead.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.brightcove.freewheel.controller.FreeWheelController(Activity, SurfaceView, EventEmitter)
    com.brightcove.freewheel.controller.FreeWheelController(Activity, SurfaceView, EventEmitter, IAdManager)
